Using a piece of paper with a [[Fūinjutsu|sealing]] formula on it, the user generates thousands of tiny pieces of paper to engulf the target, robbing them of their sight and enabling the user to hide in their presence.

== Trivia ==
* The kanji "吹雪" literally means "[[wikipedia:snowstorm|snowstorm]]". Combined with the kanji for {{translation|paper|紙|kami}}, it means "[[wikipedia:confetti|confetti]]".

[[fr:Rupture du Sceau - Tempête de Papier]]
[[pl:Kaifūjutsu: Kamifubuki]]
